content: पीठं {@--1@} A seat (a stool, chair, bench, sofa &c.); जवेन पीठादुदतिष्ठदच्युतः <ls>Śi. 1. 12</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 84</ls>; <ls n="R.">6. 15.</ls> {@--2@} The seat of a religious student made of Kuśa grass. {@--3@} The seat of a deity, an altar. {@--4@} A pedestal in general, basis. {@--5@} A particular posture in sitting. {@--6@} (In geometry) The complement of a segment.
